metadata.title: CVE-2024-1975 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: If a server hosts a zone containing a "KEY" Resource Record, or a resolverDNSSEC-validates a "KEY" Resource Record from a DNSSEC-signed domain incache, a client can exhaust resolver CPU resources by sending a stream ofSIG(0) signed requests.This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.0.0 through 9.11.37, 9.16.0 through9.16.50, 9.18.0 through 9.18.27, 9.19.0 through 9.19.24, 9.9.3-S1 through9.11.37-S1, 9.16.8-S1 through 9.16.49-S1, and 9.18.11-S1 through9.18.27-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
